Archive

Smile Face-in


LG laptop Gram User Identification System
Users can sign in their OS using face recognition, without typing ID and PW every time. It prevents authentication using stolen photos by encouraging natural changes in facial expressions.

System

C, C++, LG face recognition ML engine

Windows Service Developmen
Implemented for LG Gram laptop

Role

Ideation, Research, Algorithm

Professional work at LG electronics
Seoul, 2014-2015
